actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the posting of campaign signs on private property without the express approval of the owner or tenant.

summary.text: Prohibits the posting of campaign signs on private property without the express approval of the owner or tenant. Subjects violators to a fine of not more than $1,000, imprisonment for not more than one year, or both. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 618)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the posting of campaign signs on private property without the express approval of the owner or tenant.
